mdRecord.dcterms:title: A Letter to the People of The United States of America, from George Washington on His Resignation of the Office of President of the United States.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, George, 1732-1799
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: London: printed for J. Debrett, opposite Burlington-House, Picadilly, 1796.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Pamphlet of Washington's farewell address published in London. Contains marginalia, 32 p.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, George, 1732-1799 -- Presidency
